name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Full Stack Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications within dynamic environments, specifically in billing and credit card processing solutions. Proficient in **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, and front-end technologies like **React**, with a robust ability to build serverless architectures using **AWS**, **GCP**, and **Azure**. Expertise in implementing **EKS** for container orchestration and integrating **SQS** for asynchronous communication.

Hands-on experience in developing usage-based billing systems, metering, and invoicing, with a strong adherence to auditing and record-keeping standards. Adept at collaborating within cross-functional teams to solve complex problems, utilizing strong communication skills and ownership mindset in fast-paced environments. Furthermore, well-versed in **MongoDB** and compliance surrounding financial services. Background in AI/ML-powered platforms, employing tools such as **FastAPI**, **Django**, and CI/CD pipelines for continuous integration and delivery.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed full-stack applications utilizing **Node.js** and **TypeScript**, incorporating effective solutions for billing, invoicing, and credit card processing tasks within the **AWS** and **Azure** environments.
• Implemented serverless components using **AWS Lambda** and **Azure Functions** to enhance application performance and reduce costs in telecommunications and finance domains.
• Engineered dynamic user interfaces with **React** (17-18) and supported usage-based billing models through innovative state management and component architecture.
• Created and maintained robust backend systems with **MongoDB** for record-keeping and auditing, ensuring compliance with financial regulations.
• Led the use of **EKS** for deploying scalable applications in **Kubernetes** orchestrated environments, optimizing resource utilization and operational efficiency.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design microservices architecture for billing and metering functionalities, focusing on effective communication and teamwork within fast-paced settings.
• Conducted thorough debugging and problem-solving to ensure high application performance and reliability across multiple platforms.
• Applied **SQS** for effective message handling in serverless architecture, improving transaction handling times and user experience.
• Maintained and enhanced CI/CD processes leveraging **GitHub Actions** and **Azure DevOps**, with complete test automation and security checks integrated across development environments.
• Engaged with stakeholders to define project requirements and ownership of features, ensuring alignment with business goals and operational excellence.

Utilized **Typescript** and **Node.js** to develop microservices for billing and invoicing systems, significantly improving transaction processing speeds by **30%**.
Engineered front-end applications leveraging **React (18)** and **Next.js** for user interfaces, successfully enhancing user engagement metrics by **25%** through refined interaction design.
Implemented usage-based billing solutions and metering services, achieving real-time data accuracy for over **100,000** transactions monthly.
Created asynchronous workflows with **AWS SQS** and **EKS**, ensuring reliable communication for payment processing and auditing tasks, which reduced error rates by **15%**.
Integrated **MongoDB** for robust record-keeping, allowing for seamless retrieval and management of financial data across various applications.
Designed and deployed serverless functions within the **AWS** environment to automate financial reports, resulting in a **40%** decrease in manual processing time.
Enhanced team collaboration through effective communication practices and ownership of projects within a fast-paced development environment, navigating challenges with problem-solving and debugging skills.
Leveraged **Azure** services for secure cloud solutions in credit card processing, adhering to stringent compliance and sales tax regulations, which improved audit response efficiency by **20%**.
Actively participated in team initiatives, fostering a culture of teamwork while mentoring junior developers in best practices of full-stack development.

• Developed scalable backend services using **Node.js** (NestJS, Express) and **MongoDB**, ensuring robust data management and efficient handling of billing processes including **credit card processing** and **invoicing** for a global e-commerce platform.
• Implemented serverless architecture and asynchronous messaging using **AWS SQS** and **EKS**, achieving high availability and responsiveness in a **fast-paced environment** with dynamic demand.
• Engineered real-time functionalities through **WebSockets** and event-driven systems with **Kafka**, streamlining customer interactions and enabling efficient communication during peak traffic periods.
• Built user-centric frontend applications with **React** (18) and **TypeScript**, facilitating *usage-based billing* features for enhanced user experience and engagement in both web and mobile environments.
• Managed comprehensive data storage solutions using **Mongo**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Redis**, ensuring optimized performance and reliable access across high-traffic workflows while adhering to **record-keeping** principles.
• Designed and integrated payment systems using **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, with a focus on secure processing for transactions and compliance with **sales tax** regulations.
• Applied **role-based access control (RBAC)** and **OAuth 2.0**, ensuring secure user data management and compliance with data protection standards including **GDPR**.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams, enhancing **teamwork** and fostering **communication** to troubleshoot and resolve **problem solving** challenges during project developments.
• Practiced **debugging** techniques in both **Node.js** and frontend frameworks, maintaining platform integrity and operational excellence throughout the software development lifecycle.
• Spearheaded the creation of SEO-friendly UI components using **Next.js** and **HTML5/CSS3**, focusing on mobile-first design principles and compliance with accessibility standards **(WCAG 2.1)**.
